definition: Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
everything clear and in good order (idiom); neat and tidy

sentences.english: I've been keeping my room as neat as a pin, and the yard is always ship-shape.
sentences.chinese: 我一直保持房间井然有序，院子也是修得井井有条的。

sentences.english: There are six households inhabiting in the building, compact and orderly.
sentences.chinese: 楼内住有六户人家，家居紧凑，井然有序。

sentences.english: The ten Dharma Realms are still in order and not mixed up.
sentences.chinese: 法界还是十法界，井然不乱。

sentences.english: By just enjoying this, you ran your family and everything went along well?
sentences.chinese: 你只去享受这些就能把家里一切事务管理得井然有序？

sentences.english: This is a butterfly-shaped crossroads. The vehicles driving towards all directions are in good order.
sentences.chinese: 这是一座蝶式立交桥，去往各个方向的车辆井然有序。

sentences.english: Orderliness is being neat and living with a sense of harmony.
sentences.chinese: 条理性就是井然有序，生活和谐。

sentences.english: It means in perfect order, very well organized.
sentences.chinese: 这个短语代表井然有序，条理分明。

sentences.english: The officers moved methodically toward the body, making sure they did not disturb the crime scene.
sentences.chinese: 警察们井然有序地走向尸体，确保案发现场不被破坏。

sentences.english: Astana is clean, orderly and seemingly sedated.
sentences.chinese: 阿斯塔纳干净整洁，秩序井然，超凡脱俗。

sentences.english: I stopped noticing India’s newness, oldness and juxtapositioned-ness.
sentences.chinese: 我不再留意印度的新鲜，古老以及井然有序。

sentences.english: The Jade Emperor's rule is orderly and without caprice.
sentences.chinese: 玉帝的规则是井然有序，不会反复无常的。

sentences.english: God is in his heaven, all's right with the world.
sentences.chinese: 上帝在天国之中，世上的一切秩序井然。

sentences.english: The troops retired in good order.
There are formal parks and other green areas around the city.
sentences.chinese: 城市里到处是井然有致的公园和绿地。

sentences.english: The chaos of travel has given way to the order of home.
sentences.chinese: 旅途的喧嚣混乱已经被家的秩序井然所取代。

definition: Seiko, Japanese watch and electronics company
in picturesque disorder (idiom); irregular arrangement with charming effect
according to a pattern/regular/orderly/structured/neat and tidy
to analyze thoroughly, point by point (idiom)
